title: WTB- Johnson Port and Green Cobb PSA 4-5

posts.post_title: WTB- Johnson Port and Green Cobb PSA 4-5
posts.post_content:
Looking for two upgrades for my set.  Johnson portrait in PSA 4 or better is the priority but also would be interested in a Green Cobb for an upgrade, too.  PM if you happen to have one you're thinking of selling.

Thanks!!
